body:
Breakingviews

Breakingviews TV: Salty chips

Posted

Nvidia’s $40 billion purchase of chip designer Arm is a bold bet by CEO Jensen Huang on the burgeoning market for supercomputing. However, as Liam Proud explains, it’s also a politically fraught deal that will be scrutinised by just about every major government worldwide.
title: Breakingviews TV: Salty chips
